text:
59 yo male with DM, ESRD on HD, dilated cardiomyopathy & HTN presented
   to OSH for shortness of breath and found to have hyperkalemia with QRS
   changes, hypertension and pulmonary edema.
   Hyperkalemia (high Potassium, Hyperpotassemia)
   Assessment:
   K+ s/p HD from overnight  3.5-3.8, Ca+ 8.7 BUN/CRe down to 34/6.3. U/O
   0-10cc/hr. Having lrge amts diarrhea.
   Action:
   Started on HD for just UF @ 1530.
   Response:
   K+ down to WNL
s s/p HD.
   Plan:
   Monitor K+ levels, perform HD or UF as needed.
   Airway, Inability to Protect (Risk for Aspiration, Altered Gag, Airway
   Clearance, Cough)
   Assessment:
   A/C 50%/550/16 with Peep-10, on Fentanyl and Versed Gtts for sedation.
   Suctioning mod amts thin rusty colored sputum with sediment noted. L/S
   rhonchi to crackles @ bases. CXR showing Pulmonary edema. Last ABG-
   7.47/47/151/9/35  O2 sats 96-99%.
   Action:
   Fentanyl and Versed Gtt
s changed to Propofol Gtt, sputum spec sent for
   C&S. Able to decrease  Peep-8,  and FIO2-40%
   Response:
   Tolerating Propofol Gtt, and decreased Peep and FIO2.
   Plan:
   Monitor ABG
s, and O2 sats , qd CXR
s, pulmonary toilet.
   Hypertension, benign
   Assessment:
   BP- 140-170
s/70
s with HR-90-[**Street Address(2) 3429**] with frequ ectopy PVC
s and
   APC
s. due to high K+ levels.  With agitation BP
s up to >200
s/90
   and HR to 120
   Action:
   Was started on PO Lopressor, and required increased sedation
   Response:
   BP  down to 90-100
s/50 HR -70-80
s SR with decreased ectopy with
   normal lytes.
   Plan:
   Monitor BP and HR, check lytes.
   Alteration in Elimination Related to Diarrhea
   Assessment:
   Lrge amts of extremely foul smelling stool,  which is liquidy brown OB
   neg s/p Kayexlyte that was  given overnight. HCT-32.4. Also having lrge
   amts green OB neg bilious drainage from OGT. [**Last Name (un) **] soft with +BS. Has
   flexi-seal tube in place.
   Action:
   Stool sent for C-diff and C&S.
   Response:
   Foul smelling diarrhea has slowed.
   Plan:
   Monitor stooling amt, check C&S results.
